definition: Shen Fu (1763-c. 1810), Qing dynasty writer, author of Six Records of a Floating Life 浮生六記|浮生六记[Fu2 Sheng1 Liu4 Ji4]
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out

sentences.english: Six Chapters of a Floating Life is an individual memoir of SHEN Fu who lived in QING Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《浮生六記》是清人沈復所著的一部個人回憶錄。
